text.__SUMMARY__: Fritillaria drenovskii is a rare European species of plants in the lily family, native to the Thrace region of northeastern Greece, as well as Blagoevgrad Province in southwestern Bulgaria.The species is listed as "vulnerable" by the IUCN Red List.
